mapper.select: SELECT B.ID AS id,B.BOX_ID AS boxId,B.SORT_NO AS sortNo,B.BOX_LEAVE AS boxLeave,B.BOX_NAME AS boxName,B.ACCOUNT_ID AS accountId,B.ORG_ID AS orgId, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EMAIL E WHERE E.ORG_ID=B.ORG_ID AND E.BOX_ID=B.BOX_ID) AS total FROM EMAIL_BOX B WHERE B.ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND B.ACCOUNT_ID=#{accountId}
